title: My Kids Ruined the Holiday
description:
Charlotte is upset that the plans she made for Easter weekend fell apart after she insisted that everyone or no one attend the festivities. - Dr. Laura: "Adult children need their parents to be flexible, not demanding."

Is it easy or difficult to get your grown children and their families together? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
